backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing homepage content storage, user profiles, and admin‑protected updates using access control maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two feature changes with affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all major frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color palette and layout tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata and root element loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that switches between public homepage and admin editor based on authorization state.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/admin/: Shows an access-denied screen with a message and a button to exit when the user lacks admin permissions.
Provides an admin login dialog that validates an admin code, updates session state, and triggers backend admin checks.
Implements a full content editor interface for homepage data including testimonials and menus with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/data/c: Contains static menu items, highlights, testimonials, and contact info used as default homepage content.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/Footer: Footer with quick links, admin login handling, and branding info minus Instagram links.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/NavBar: Responsive navbar with scroll navigation, admin login flow, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/RoyalCafe/sectio: Renders the About section with feature cards describing the cafe’s qualities.
Displays contact details, address, hours, and a map link using either fetched or default content.
Empty placeholder file for a gallery section.
Renders the hero banner with background image, logo, tagline, location, and navigation buttons.
Renders a highlights grid by parsing highlight strings and showing skeletons while loading. Displays name, description, price, and optional badge for each item.
Shows menu categories with item details and prices, falling back to skeletons during loading. Uses content-provided categories to render structured menu sections.
Parses testimonial strings and displays a reviews grid with stars, quotes, and author info, with skeleton placeholders while loading.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines shared React Query keys for actors, admin status, and homepage content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Wraps admin-status query and returns admin flag, loading state, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePageContent.ts: Fetches homepage content with fallback defaults and exposes a mutation helper to save updated content.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client creation, login state, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and updating homepage content and checking admin status, initializing access control when needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes, font settings, and utility classes for the Royal Cafe theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/accessControlInit.ts: Initializes backend actor access control using a stored admin token, memoizing per actor instance.
frontend/src/utils/adminCode.ts: Normalizes admin codes and exposes the canonical expected admin code for validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, and animations using the Royal Cafe design variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing design goals, requirements, known issues, and current feature implementations for the Royal Cafe website.
